user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Multi-Factor Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement secure login using multi-factor authentication and role-based controls to protect user data.
epics.description: This epic focuses on the implementation of a secure authentication system using multi-factor authentication (MFA) to verify user identities before granting access to the self-service banking portal. It also ensures proper role-based access control (RBAC), allowing users to access only products and services relevant to their profiles and authorization levels. Encryption of customer credentials, secure session management, and compliance with banking security standards will form the foundation of this module to protect sensitive financial information.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard and Customer Profile Management
epics.summary: Design a personalized dashboard showing customer-specific products, services, and account information.
epics.description: This epic includes developing a dynamic and personalized dashboard where customers can view information related to their accounts, eligible products, and tailored banking services. The dashboard will integrate customer profile data and apply logic to display only applicable options based on the user’s account type, history, and eligibility. Real-time data synchronization will ensure accuracy of displayed information. It will serve as the central hub for accessing portal features, providing an intuitive interface for navigation and interaction.

epics.title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Enable digital workflows for account openings and service modification with efficient customer guidance.
epics.description: This epic introduces guided workflows designed to simplify the process of opening new accounts or modifying existing services. Customers will experience step-by-step guidance with real-time data validation, contextual help, and automated checks against eligibility criteria. The system will allow document uploads, auto-saving of partial progress, and resumption of incomplete applications. The workflow engine will integrate with backend systems to ensure fast and accurate processing, reducing manual intervention and branch dependencies.

epics.title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide tracking and notification mechanisms to keep customers informed about their requests.
epics.description: This epic ensures that customers receive real-time updates and notifications for every lifecycle stage of their submitted requests or account activities. The backend system will push updates through the portal, email, and optional SMS channels. Templates will be designed for submission confirmations, approvals, and information requests. The functionality aims to enhance transparency and customer trust by providing easily accessible tracking details and automated status alerts.

epics.title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Data Security
epics.summary: Maintain a detailed and secure history of all customer interactions and transactions within the portal.
epics.description: This epic focuses on recording all user interactions within the self-service platform, ensuring every action—logins, document uploads, service requests, and approvals—is tracked in a secure audit trail. The history module will allow customers to review their past activities for clarity and accountability while administrators can access logs for compliance and monitoring. Data encryption, access control, and adherence to data privacy regulations will ensure protection of sensitive information at all times.

epics.title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface Design
epics.summary: Deliver an adaptive and accessible portal interface optimized across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
epics.description: This epic covers the creation of a fully responsive and accessible front-end design that ensures a consistent and optimal user experience across all device types. The interface will adhere to modern design principles, focus on clarity, efficiency, and accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1), and support multiple languages if required. By leveraging responsive frameworks, the system will provide uniform navigation, fast load times, and seamless user experiences for desktop, tablet, and mobile users.

epics.title: Core Banking Integration and Independent Data Management
epics.summary: Integrate seamlessly with core banking systems while managing portal-specific operations independently.
epics.description: This epic ensures a robust integration between the self-service portal and the existing core banking systems through secure APIs or middleware services. It will handle real-time data synchronization, allowing accurate reflection of account details, product offerings, and status updates. The portal will also maintain an independent, high-performance database for caching and workflow management to optimize performance and reliability. Security measures, transaction consistency, and error handling frameworks will guarantee smooth, reliable, and compliant operations.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication for Secure Login
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in using multi-factor authentication methods, so that my account security is enhanced.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: System must support one-time passwords, biometric confirmation, and app-based tokens.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. User can enable multi-factor authentication.
2. System prompts for multi-factor authentication during login.
3. Successful login only occurs after valid multi-factor authentication.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user has enabled multi-factor authentication, When the user logs in, Then the system should prompt for multi-factor authentication and allow access only upon successful validation.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Enforce Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to assign roles to users, so that they have appropriate access based on their profiles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: System must define roles for customers, employees, and administrators with specific permissions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Administrator can create and assign roles to users.
2. System enforces access control based on assigned roles.
3. Unauthorized access attempts are logged.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an administrator assigns a role to a user, When the user attempts an action, Then the system should allow or deny access based on the user’s role.

user_stories.title: Develop Personalized Customer Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I see relevant banking products and services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should display key account balances, recommendations, and transaction summaries.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Dashboard displays customer's account information accurately.
2. Recommendations are shown based on user profile and behavior.
3. Transaction summaries are updated in real-time.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer logs in, When navigating to the dashboard, Then the dashboard should display personalized information correctly.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Implement Guided Workflow for Account Opening
user_stories.description: As a new customer, I want an easy-to-follow workflow to open an account, so that I can complete the process without errors.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow should include steps for data validation, document upload, and system-driven guidance.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Workflow assists with necessary information and documents.
2. Customer can save and resume the application.
3. Errors or missing information are flagged in real-time.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new customer starts the workflow, When providing required information, Then the system should validate data and guide the user through completion.

user_stories.title: Provide Real-Time Status Updates for Requests
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want real-time updates on my requests, so that I am always informed about the status.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: System should display progress indicators and notify customers through email or in-app messages.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Request status updates are shown in real-time.
2. Notifications are sent for submissions, approvals, and rejections.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer submits a request, When the status changes, Then the system should update the status and notify the customer appropriately.

user_stories.epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Data Audit
user_stories.title: Maintain Detailed Customer Interaction Logs
user_stories.description: As a security officer, I want to view detailed interaction logs, so that I can audit customer activities for compliance.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Logs should be secure, tamper-proof, and accessible for auditing purposes.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. All interactions are logged securely.
2. Logs are tamper-proof and contain all necessary details.
3. Security officers can access logs for auditing.
user_stories.test_cases: Given customer interaction happens, When viewing the logs, Then the system should show detailed and secure logs of the events.

user_stories.title: Ensure Responsive and Accessible Web Design
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an accessible interface, so that I can use the portal seamlessly on any device and be compliant with accessibility standards.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Design must comply with WCAG 2.1 standards and work across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. UI is accessible according to WCAG 2.1 standards.
2. Interface is responsive across different devices.
3. Consistent styling and user-friendly interactions are maintained.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer accesses the portal on any device, When interacting with the interface, Then the system should ensure that the interface is responsive and accessible.

user_stories.epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Data Management Layer
user_stories.title: Integrate Portal with Core Banking Systems
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to integrate the self-service portal with core banking systems, so that data is synchronized in real-time.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration should use secure APIs and maintain an independent database for session management.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Secure APIs are developed for data exchange.
2. Independent database manages sessions and caching.
3. Data flow and encryption mechanisms ensure integrity and security.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a data exchange request, When synchronizing with core systems, Then the system should use secure APIs and ensure data integrity and security.
